description:
Binary Holds are now making their hold packs out of recycled plastic, so future generations can enjoy getting a grip on our planet too.

Small 1-pad edges to create a crimp masterpiece. Some flat, some incut, the Vector's are great for training finger strength or mimicing your outdoor project.

  • Made from recycled ABS
  • Comes with mounting hardware
name: Binary Holds Vector Medium Recycled 5 Crimp Hold Pack
